# remove udev old network rules rm -f /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules rm -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0 rm -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth1 chkconfig rocks-dynip on
ssh compute-0-0 rm -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0 ssh compute-0-0 rm -f /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules ssh compute-0-0 yum install rocks-dynip-compute ssh compute-0-0 chkconfig rocks-dynip on ssh compute-0-0 chkconfig rocks-dynip-post on ssh compute-0-0 chkconfig rocks-grub off
